Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Collapses all Events outside of your current zone.

Control.Tooltip: Collapses all Quests outside of your current region.

Control.Tooltip: Shows Tradeskill Quests if you are near a Crafting Station.

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Shows Dungeon Quests, if you are in a Dungeon. (Not working)

Control.Name: StandardButton
Control.Tooltip: The standard Layout with Story Segments and Episodes.

Control.Name: SimpleButton
Control.Tooltip: A simple Layout without any Segments.

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Aligns the quests in the top of the area instead of the bottom.

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Sorts the Quests by distance. Doesn't change the order of Segments!
